ingredients.ingredient: 1 tablespoon pork rub seasoning, or to taste
2 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into bite-size pieces
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Apply the pork rub seasoning and five-spice powder to the roast before cooking for maximum flavor penetration
Layer sweet potatoes on the bottom to create a natural bed and prevent sticking
The brown sugar and butter create a caramelized glaze as the roast cooks
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This sweet and savory dish combines pork with caramelized sweet potatoes. How does the five-spice powder complement the brown sugar, and why should sweet potatoes go on the bottom of the slow cooker?
